description: This role will allow you to do any operation in KYPO adaptive training microservice.
This role will allow you to manage, test, import and export adaptive training definitions in KYPO adaptive training microservice.

This role will allow you to prepare adaptive training instances from adaptive training definitions and manage them, restart sandbox instances and view situational awareness in KYPO adaptive training microservice.
This role is default and will allow you to access adaptive training run and play a game in KYPO adaptive training microservice.
